org.nerd4j.csv

Interface CSVProcessOperation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CSVFieldConverter<S,T>, CSVFieldValidator<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCSVFieldConverter, AbstractCSVFieldValidator, BooleanToString, CheckNumberRange, CheckRegEx, CheckStringLength, DateToString, EmptyCSVFieldConverter, EmptyCSVFieldValidator, EnumToString, NumberToString, StringToBoolean, StringToDate, StringToEnum, StringToNumber

    public interface CSVProcessOperation
    Represents an object able to perform an atomic operation over a CSV field.

    This interface is intended to be of help for the CSVProcessError.

    The error pattern returned by this interface method must be according with the use made by the CSVProcessError.

    Author:
    Nerd4j Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getErrorMessagePattern()
      Returns a message pattern as described in the MessageFormat class.

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorMessagePattern

        String getErrorMessagePattern()
        Returns a message pattern as described in the MessageFormat class.

        The placeholders in this pattern coincide with fields of the CSVFieldProcessContext as follows:

        • {0} = columnName;
        • {1} = originalValue;
        • {2} = convertedValue.
        Returns:
        the pattern to use to build the error message.
